Description.Text: The Shoreham is located just off 5th Avenue on 55th Street, and is steps away from the finest 5th Avenue boutiques and shopping areas. A few steps away you will find Rockefeller Center; The Museum of Modern Art; Carnegie Hall; Lincoln Center; Central Park and the Broadway theatre District. The Shoreham's sleek and contemporary design provides the perfect combination of downtown chic with the unbeatable location of midtown Manhattan. Specializing in personalized services, comfort and style, it is a quiet retreat. Voted 'Best New Business Hotel 2005' in October's Issue of Forbes.com.

• Museum of Modern Art - 1 block • Broadway Theater District - 2 blocks • Carnegie Hall - 3 blocks • Museum of Television and Radio - 3 blocks • Central Park - 4 blocks • Radio City Music Hall - 5 blocks • Rockefeller Center - 5 blocks • St. Patrick's Cathedral - 5 blocks • Saks Fifth Avenue - 5 blocks • Columbus Circle - 6 blocks • Lincoln Center - 9 blocks • Times Square - 10 blocks

The Shoreham is all about harmony, both in public areas and in 174 guest rooms and suites. Eastern and Western design principles fuse seamlessly to simultaneously to create energy and serenity. The guest rooms are equipped with Belgium linens, pillow-top mattresses, plush cotton terry robes, Aveda Bath Products, marble tile & slate bathrooms, VCR's, Bose Wave Radio and CD Players, LG Flat-Panel Screen Televisions, Voss bottled spring water, personal laptop safes, irons and ironing boards. Select rooms offer 5-head Rain showers and jacuzzi bathtubs. Wireless high-speed Internet is complimentary through out the hotel and available in all guest rooms.

Conveniently located in midtown Manhattan on 55th Street between 5th and 6th Avenues, the Shoreham Hotel is located within walking distance of many of Manhattan's most important business addresses, the finest 5th Avenue shopping, Central Park, Broadway Theatres and Carnegie Hall. Renovated in 2005, the Shoreham Hotel establishes a contemporary ambience in a lobby with gray-marble floor, stainless-steel columns, low seating, candles, and recessed floor and ceiling lights. Original video and interactive works are featured throughout the hotel’s lobby and public spaces. Upon arrival, guests are offered glasses of sparkling water or champagne.

• Ice skating • Rowing or canoeing • Running track/path • Tennis • Pilates classes/instruction • Yoga classes/instruction • Hiking/biking trails • Horse riding/rental • Helicopter/airplane sightseeing
• Pets accepted • Check-in time is 3 PM • Check-out time is Noon

Driving directions from JFK: Take I-678 (Van Wyck Expwy) north to SR 25 west. Bear left onto Queens Plaza N, take the Queensboro Bridge and exit to 2nd Ave south. Turn left on 2nd, then turn right on E 57th St. Turn left on 5th Ave, then turn right on W 55th St.

The Shoreham Bar - Street-view restaurant and lounge. Contemporary decor featuring silk leaves sandwiched between sheets of aqua-colored glass, lime-green lounge-style seating at low glass-and-brushed-aluminum tables. Serving Continental and à la carte breakfast, lunch, and dinner, plus bar service until late night.
